alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:44PM CDT until July 14 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Putnam County in north central Illinois... Bureau County in north central Illinois... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Van Orin to near Neponset, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Princeton, Hennepin, Spring Valley, Henry, DePue, Granville, Ladd, Wyanet, Tiskilwa, La Moille, Dalzell, Buda, Bureau Junction, McNabb, Putnam, Mark, Cherry, Malden, Seatonville and Magnolia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
